item.title: Labuan International Business and Financial Centre (IBFC) is initiating roadshows across the ASEAN region
item.description: Labuan IBFC, a prominent international business and financial hub in the Asia Pacific region, has initiated a series of roadshows throughout ASEAN. The 2016 Labuan IBFC ASEAN Roadshow will cover major ASEAN countries and, for the first time, will include both events and private briefings in the developing markets of Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The roadshows, which began in Jakarta, Indonesia, will run until the end of July. Danial Mah Abdullah, Chief Executive Officer of Labuan IBFC, stated, “This year’s roadshow is unique in that we are focusing on regional businesses seeking to internationalize or expand regionally.
